name: Grilled Red Snapper with Lemon and Jalapeno
author: brandy
summary: Delicious grilled red snapper dish that is easy to prepare.
directions: Place snapper fillets in a glass baking dish and pour Italian dressing over top
Gently turn fish to evenly coat
Cover the dish with plastic wrap and marinate in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat
Make a tray with aluminum foil and spray with cooking spray
Remove fish from the dressing and place on the foil tray
Place lemon slices and jalapenos on top
Place the tray on the preheated grill and cook until fish begins to turn a nice, light color and flakes easily with a fork, 5 to 6 minutes per side
